column1: Uchi////We tried the omakase which was $100
column2: but it's based on market price so it will vary. Our table favorites were Hama chili
column6: hamachi nabe & a curry dish. As for desserts
column7: the classic fried milk is a must. The red bean cheesecake on their daily special was great too!! Oh but a must have like a must must have
column8: foie gras. Don't leave without trying this tender
column10: melt in your mouth duck fat. Don't even need to bite it
column11: just let the fat dissolve into your taste buds.
